backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all backend data types (DiscountCode, TaxConfig, SaleOrder, Customer, StaffAccount, AuditLog, etc.) and their in-memory maps with auto-incrementing IDs; includes access control via MixinAuthorization and an audit logging helper.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the fix for the 'Actor not available' error on the Add Customer form, listing the affected files (useQueries.ts, CustomersPage.tsx) and associated test/component metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing one-to-two sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the 'Salad Khatora' app that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration that defines all application routes (dashboard, inventory, sales, customers, etc.) under a shared Layout wrapper, with a login route outside the layout and an index redirect to /dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AddIngredientFor: React form component for creating a new ingredient with fields for name, quantity, unit, cost, min stock level, optional supplier selection, and optional expiry date, using the useCreateIngredient and useSuppliers hooks.
A dialog component that displays a formatted bill receipt after an order is confirmed, showing items, subtotal, discounts, taxes, payment mode, and a print button.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutDialog.t: A dialog component for confirming an order that displays order items, totals, and allows the user to select a payment method (Cash, Card, or UPI) before confirming.
frontend/src/components/CustomerDetailVi: A detailed customer profile view showing contact info, loyalty points balance, transaction history, and order history, with a dialog to redeem loyalty points.
frontend/src/components/EditIngredientFo: A form component for editing an existing ingredient's details including name, quantity, unit, cost, stock level, supplier, and expiry date.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main application layout component providing a responsive sidebar navigation with grouped nav sections, dark mode toggle, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: An empty file with no content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using the user's Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDarkMode.ts: A React hook that manages dark mode state by toggling a CSS class on the document root and persisting the preference to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines all React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for interacting with the backend canister, along with shared TypeScript types for menu items, orders, inventory, staff, and other domain entities.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind CSS layers, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH colors, and adds print styles for receipt rendering.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSettingsPage.tsx: Admin settings page that displays the current user's role and provides a button for non-admins to claim the admin role via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AlertsPage.tsx: Alerts page that lists system notifications with type-based icons and badges, and supports marking individual or all alerts as read.
frontend/src/pages/AuditLogPage.tsx: Displays a paginated audit log table showing system actions with actor, action type (color-coded), target, and details. Uses the `useAuditLogs` hook and supports loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CombosPage.tsx: Manages combo deals with CRUD operations and availability toggling, allowing users to bundle menu items with a custom price and calculated savings. Uses dialogs for add/edit and an alert dialog for deletion confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Provides a customer management interface with search, add, edit, delete, and detail-view functionality. Uses query hooks for CRUD operations and displays inline error messages extracted from backend rejections.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders a summary dashboard with stat cards for total revenue, total orders, and average order value, plus a list of the 5 most recent sale orders. Data is fetched via React Query using the actor hook.
Shows upcoming subscription deliveries grouped by date within a configurable day range (adjustable in 7-day increments). Filters active subscriptions and maps menu item IDs to names for display.
frontend/src/pages/DiscountsPage.tsx: Provides a full CRUD UI for managing discount codes, including dialogs for creating/editing codes with fields like type, value, expiry, and max uses, plus toggle active/inactive and delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Displays a searchable table of ingredients with stock levels, expiry status, and cost, supporting add, edit, and delete operations via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with an Internet Identity sign-in button, handles authentication state, and redirects to the dashboard upon successful login.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Shows a searchable grid of menu items with support for creating, editing, deleting, and toggling availability, using a shared form dialog for add/edit operations.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseOrdersPage.ts: Manages purchase orders with a list view showing status badges and expandable details, plus a dialog to create new orders by selecting a supplier and adding ingredient line items.
frontend/src/pages/SalesPage.tsx: Implements a point-of-sale interface where staff can build an order from menu items, apply discount codes, select a customer, and complete checkout with payment mode selection and bill receipt display.
frontend/src/pages/SalesReportsPage.tsx: Displays a sales reports page with daily/weekly period toggle, summary cards for total revenue, total orders, and average revenue, and a detailed data table fetched via the useSalesReport hook.
frontend/src/pages/StaffAccountsPage.tsx: Manages staff accounts with a table listing accounts and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting staff members, supporting roles (cashier, manager, admin) and active/inactive status.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionsPage.tsx: Provides a subscriptions management page allowing users to create, pause, resume, and cancel customer subscriptions with menu item selection and frequency configuration.
frontend/src/pages/SuppliersPage.tsx: Implements a suppliers management page with search, and dialogs for adding, editing, and deleting suppliers including form validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/TaxConfigPage.tsx: Manages tax configurations with a table of tax entries and dialogs for creating, editing, toggling, and deleting tax configs, supporting rate and appliesTo (all, menu items, combos) fields.
frontend/src/pages/WasteLogPage.tsx: React page for logging ingredient waste and spoilage, featuring a form to record waste entries (ingredient, quantity, reason) and a table of past logs with stats cards showing total cost loss and entry count.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to extract URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens (using oklch/hsl CSS variables), font families (Poppins, Inter), border radii, box shadows, and accordion keyframe animations, with the animate and typography plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version, known issues, and existing/new feature requests; currently focused on fixing an 'Actor not available' error when submitting the Add Customer form.
